posts.name: maxim
posts.cooked:
Hi All, can somebody please help with this issue? I started fdbrestore, but the process just stuck at some point of time. What can be a possible solution?

Here are logs:

backup_agent -C /pvcs/task-pv-claim/fdb.cluster &


fdbrestore start -r file:///pvcs/task-pv-claim/backup-2021-10-15-10-00-31.618701 --dest_cluster_file /pvcs/task-pv-claim/fdb.cluster -w

No restore target version given, will use maximum restorable version from backup description.
Using target restore version 49058127610718
